alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 4:15AM AKST until November 21 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Light freezing rain likely. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Elevations lower than 1000 ft. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads, and bridges are likely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures have dropped below freezing at lower elevations of the Anchorage bowl early this morning. Another wave of light rain is heading toward Anchorage from the southeast and may bring more freezing rain this morning. The most likely time for additional freezing rain will be from 7 AM to 11 AM this morning. By noon, most temperatures around Anchorage should have warmed above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
